title: Digital-Based Self-Directed Learning Design Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital tools and understanding of fundamental instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Flexible part-time operation for working teachers, structured around language education application case studies

learning_goals: Design three or more assessment rubrics to promote self-directed learning in online environments.
Interpret learner engagement data using learning analytics tools at least twice and incorporate findings into instructional strategies.
Plan and execute project-based activities at least once on a digital platform (e.g., Moodle).
Develop one or more personalized automated feedback systems for learners.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
